content: शिखा [शी-खक् तस्य नेत्वम् पृषो°; <ls>Uṇ. 5. 24</ls>] {@--1@} A lock of hair left on the crown of the head; <ls>Mu. 3. 30</ls>; <ls>Śi. 4. 50</ls>; <ls>Māl. 10. 6.</ls> {@--2@} A crest, top-knot. {@--3@} Tuft, plume. {@--4@} Top, summit, peak; <ls>Ki. 6. 17.</ls> {@--5@} Sharp end, edge, point or end in general; <ls>Ś. 1. 4</ls>; <ls>Bv. 1. 2.</ls> {@--6@} The end of a garment; तोयाधारपथाश्च वल्कलशि खानिष्यंदरेखंकिता; <ls>Ś. 1. 14.</ls> {@--7@} A flame; प्रभामहत्या शिखयेव दीपः <ls>Ku. 1. 28</ls>; <ls>R. 17. 34.</ls> {@--8@} A ray of light; <ls>Ku. 2. 38.</ls> {@--9@} A peacock's crest or comb. {@--10@} A fibrous root. {@--11@} A branch in general, especially one taking root. {@--12@} The head or chief of anything. {@--13@} The fever of love. {@--14@} The point of the foot.
